name: Track Stacking DJ (LD46)
description:
Stack layers of music tracks together in this arcade-style game, but be careful - every layer of music you place becomes a new obstacle. You've got to avoid knocking into old music tracks as you try to add to the stack to make it varied as possible!

This game does not support the itch.io launcher in fullscreen mode (probably). Please enable sounds! :)

Game ignoring keyboard?  Please refresh! It's an issue with Unity, sorry about that.

Controls in-game, but just in case:
- A/D or Left/Right to move while falling.
- Space to fall faster while falling.
- Space to restart.

And an edit for the https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/track-stacker link, for your convenience.

--

Uses BetterMinimal.
